Title: Prohibits the use of flashing signals to indicate the presence of a photo speed violation monitoring system
Summary: Prohibits the use of flashing signals to indicate the presence of a photo speed violation monitoring system that is located in a residential area; directs the commissioner of the department of motor vehicles to define the meaning of "residential area" for such purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง1113, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the use of flashing signals to indicate the presence of a photo speed violation monitoring system
